body:
Heyo! So, If my brother want´s to play with his account on this server, Can he play, Although we have the same ip?
And What if he want´s to join Teamspeak, My Ip is banned.?
body_tagged:
Heyo! So, If my brother want´s to play with his account on this server, Can he play, Although we have the same ip?
And What if he want´s to join Teamspeak, My Ip is banned.?
title: Quick question

replies.body: Than he should be angry on you
replies.body_tagged: Than he should be angry on you

replies.body: They cannot know if it's you or your brother, so probably the answer is no.
replies.body_tagged: They cannot know if it's you or your brother, so probably the answer is no.

replies.body_tagged: He can´t play on the server?

replies.body: No he can't it will count as ban evading since the ban includes your IP

replies.body: Unless you change your IP...
replies.body_tagged: Unless you change your IP...

replies.body: Please don't give hackers ideas.

replies.body: If he appealed, his ban infraction would be shaded green, so no.
replies.body_tagged: If he appealed, his ban infraction would be shaded green, so no.

replies.body: I would understand if you were banned by accident, but you are banned on Avicus, Overcast and Badlion for hacking. I would like to know how it can happen <u>accidently</u> three times?
replies.body_tagged: I would understand if you were banned by accident, but you are banned on Avicus, Overcast and Badlion for hacking. I would like to know how it can happen <u>accidently</u> three times?

replies.body: When you get banned on Teamspeak, your IP and your unique ID will be banned. He can't use the teamspeak server then. I'm 101% sure because I have my own teamspeakserver and I know many stuff about it.
replies.body_tagged: When you get banned on Teamspeak, your IP and your unique ID will be banned. He can't use the teamspeak server then. I'm 101% sure because I have my own teamspeakserver and I know many stuff about it.

replies.body: Look on the side and click on 'Appeal an infraction' if you post a story why they should unban you than they will look to it. And maybe even unban you. But take some time in writing the appeal. And DON'T be mean/cocky to staff. It won't help you for sure!
